text: Robert Thomas Giggie (August 13, 1933 â€“ December 9, 2018) was an American professional baseball player and Major League Baseball pitcher. He played for the Milwaukee Braves from 1959 to 1960 and for the Kansas City Athletics from 1960 and 1962. He was born in Boston, Massachusetts. Giggie died on December 9, 2018 in Braintree, Massachusetts at the age of 85. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1933 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Atlanta Braves players Category:Kansas City Athletics Category:Sportspeople from Boston
title: Bob Giggie
